description: Get all the ingredients required to make a cup of tea.
name: Get ingredients
pseudocode: Identify all the necessary ingredients like tea leaves, water, and milk/lemon/sugar (optional).

description: Get all the tools required to make a cup of tea.
name: Get tools
pseudocode: Identify all the necessary tools such as a kettle, a cup, a spoon, and a tea infuser/bag (if used).
